#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int 

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   	int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    char str[60];
  
    while(t--)
    {
    	cin>>str;
    	int count=0;
    	if(str[0]!=str[1])
    		count++;
    	int n=strlen(str);
    	if(n==1){
    		printf("2\n");
    		continue;
    	}
    	for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++)
    		if(str[i]==str[i-1] || str[i]==str[i+1]){

    		}else
    			count++;


    	if(str[n-1]!=str[n-2])
    		count++;
    	int x=count;
    	LL val=1;
    	for(int i=1;i<=x;i++)
    		val=val*2;
    	printf("%lld\n",val);

    }

    return 0;
}
